entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 20.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
